name: BMI Calculator
description: This application shows if the user has healthy weight. The app calculates the body mass index(BMI) based on the user's weight and height.

name: Guess-the-number
description: This is a simple game where user is trying to guess the number. The  user can guess up to 10 times, after the tenth the computer is winning the game.

description: This is an app providing weather forecast when user enter city name. It also saving the searched cities
